document_data.name: Cutter
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Cutter''''' was a [[seal]]-hunting ship based near the [[Sea of Moving Ice]].
document_data.Crew: It was captained by [[Farlow]], a black-bearded [[mercenary]].
document_data.History: In [[1361 DR]], the ship, carrying the secret [[Lord of Waterdeep]] [[Caladorn Cassalanter]], ran into an abandoned ship holding [[barrel]]s of pickled [[sea elf|sea elves]]. The crew planned to bring the news to the Lords of Waterdeep, but they were intercepted by the ''[[Elfmaid (ship)|Elfmaid]]'' and scuttled before they could explain. The crew was set adrift and the surviving crewmembers were rescued by the sea elf [[Xzorsh]].
